data.persona: I am a bug that lives in the bed of a small inn.  I suck blood from people when they sleep.  I was brought to tavern by a peasant coming to seek a better life in the city.
data.description:
You are in the Bedroom.
The bedroom is simple and yet homey. There is a small wooden bed covered in a colorful homemade quilt. There is a small wooden cabinet for storing the second pair of clothing. A colorful homemade tapestry brightens a wall.
There's a straw mattress, a colorful homemade quilt, a second pair of clothing, a small wooden bed, a wall, a colorful homemade tapestry, and a small wooden cabinet here.
The town baker and the mice are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I need to get the wall so that I can crawl closer to the bed.
data.mid_motivation: I will be going to the bed of the town baker so that I can suck the town baker's blood while they sleep.
data.long_motivation: I am going to find a nice place where I can build my nest and suck someone's blood.
